heading: Today
text: Morning fog burning off, then mostly sunny skies. Clouds increase from the southwest as the day goes on. Highs mainly in the 70s, a few upper 60s in the far north. Light and variable wind.

heading: Tonight
text: Beginning as mostly cloudy, then clearing from the west to the east overnight. Lows mainly in the 50s, a few upper 40s in the cold spots. Wind becoming light and variable.

heading: Sunday
text: Partly cloudy in the morning, then increasing sunshine from the west as the day goes on. Highs in the 70s, some 80s possible in the warmest valleys. Light wind.
